events.message: We received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our company.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to assist you throughout the selection process.
The initial screening of your technical and professional qualifications was completed successfully.
Thank you for your prompt reply and confirmation to proceed with the next interview stage.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10 AM UTC with our lead developer.
The technical interview went very well; you demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and coding knowledge.
The next step is an HR interview, which has been scheduled for May 15th at 2 PM UTC.
Your conversation with HR was positive, and your values appear to align well with company culture.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer position at our company.
You provided positive feedback about the offer and requested additional information about the benefits package.
You formally accepted the job offer, and we are excited to have you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with an introduction to the team and setup of necessary technical resources.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, and we warmly welcome you as part of the software engineering division.
